SIDE EFFECTS FOR AZILECT: Since taking Azilect my tremors and muscle stiffness have not worsened. It's set a floor under the progress of the disease for now. My biggest concerns with this drug focus on the interaction risks (see drugs.com for the lengthy list), including mandatory avoidance of pseudoephedrine, other cold medicines, and general anesthesia.
I'm taking Azilect with Mirapex and Sinemet so don't know if it works or not. My insurance changed and now this drug costs over $300 a month. Just can't afford it since there is no generic.
It just didn't work for me. No relief from sympyoms. My PD symptoms have continued to worsen, albeit at a very slow pace.
